text:
@MiaFarrow In Europe where there is leadership, rules in place & people doing the best they can for their families & their communities.
#COVID19 heading to 0

Meanwhile in #Trump red states where the Leadership serves only #Trump ego & Ignorance & selfishness abound
#COVID19  is blowing up
